lines.text:
[to Lawrence]
Oh, the great Falcon! I haven't seen you in half a dozen murders!
This case ain't as simple as it seems. If it ain't handled right, it's liable to land me and you and your boss right in the middle of the East River in a concrete nightgown!
So?

[Giving him a pocket watch as a bribe]
So all I want you to do is accept this little token of my esteem and consider yourself my special confidential deputy.

[Angrily slapping the watch away]
It's still a stool pigeon where I come from!
sing or Sing-Sing.
Listen, O'Hara, you can't scare me, see. I know the law. You can't pin nothin' on me until you prove Corpus Delicious!
I'll give you 24 hours to make up your mind.
Start talkin' and talk fast, or I'll tell you where you're goin'.
Go ahead. Put the cuffs on me. A stretch in the clink will be like livin' at the Ritz after what I've been through.
I accept your resignation.

[after Marriot has fired a shot at him and been murdered himself]
Are you all right?
Nobody ever got killed by a blank cartridge.
May I offer you a drink?
Never before sundown.
And after that?
After that the deluge.
What about tonight?

[Not wanting to work for a client who leaves him in the dark]
I think you better get someone else.
I don't like your manner.
I'm not particularly intrigued by yours either.

[Driving while looking for the Falcon's car]
I don't see any cars, Chief.
Did it creep into that skull of yours that maybe he deliberately gave you a bum steer?
No, sir, did it in yours?
No! Shut up!
You know, I can't understand how such brilliance could get you in a spot like this.
I'm always a sucker for a beautiful woman.

[Sarcastically]
You and mankind.
Strange that we never met before.
Stranger still if we don't meet again.

[Obviously frightened of the brutish Moose, who has commandeered his car]
I guess I better drop you now. I got a date.

[Ominously]
You wouldn't want it with an angel, would you?

[Meekly nervous]
No, sir.
Then keep on drivin'.

[Meekly resigned]
Yes, sir.
Go ahead, Follow 'em!
Why, Chief?

[Condescendingly]
Because I got a gold badge and you only got a silver badge, and I want you to follow him. You don't mind, do yuh?
No, of course not, Chief.
Velma, why did you do it, Baby? Why did you do it?
